verses.verse: Think <WH2803> you this to be right <WH4941>, that you said <WH559>, My righteousness <WH6664> is more than God <WH410>'s?
For you said <WH559>, What advantage <WH5532> will it be unto you <WH3276>? and, What profit shall I have <WH2403>, if I be cleansed from my sin?
I will answer <WH7725> you <WH7453>, and your companions with you.
Look <WH5027> unto the heavens <WH8064>, and see <WH7200>; and behold <WH7789> the clouds <WH7834> which are higher than you <WH1361>.
If you sin <WH2398>, what do <WH6466> you against him <WH6588>? or if your transgressions be multiplied <WH7231>, what do you unto him <WH6213>?
If you be righteous <WH6663>, what give <WH5414> you him <WH3947>? or what receives he of your hand <WH3027>?
Your wickedness <WH7562> may hurt a man <WH376> as you are <WH6666>; and your righteousness may profit the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>.
By reason of the multitude <WH7230> of oppressions <WH6217> they make the oppressed to cry <WH2199>: they cry out <WH7768> by reason of the arm <WH2220> of the mighty <WH7227>.
But none says <WH559>, Where is God <WH433> my maker <WH6213>, who gives <WH5414> songs <WH2158> in the night <WH3915>;
Who teaches <WH502> us more than the animals <WH929> of the earth <WH776>, and makes us wiser <WH2449> than the birds <WH5775> of heaven <WH8064>?
There they cry <WH6817>, but none gives answer <WH6030>, because <WH6440> of the pride <WH1347> of evil men <WH7451>.
Surely God <WH410> will not hear <WH8085> vanity <WH7723>, neither will the Almighty <WH7706> regard it <WH7789>.
Although <WH637> you say <WH559> you shall not see <WH7789> him <WH1779>, yet judgment is before <WH6440> him <WH2342>; therefore trust you in him.
But now <WH6485>, because it is not so, he has visited in his anger <WH639>; yet he knows <WH3045> it not in great <WH3966> extremity <WH6580>:
Therefore does Job <WH347> open <WH6475> his mouth <WH6310> in vain <WH1892>; he multiplies <WH3527> words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge <WH1847>.
